Class PersonHandler

java.lang.Object
PersonHandler
public class PersonHandler extends Object
This class performs methods which handle person information in the database.

  • Method Details

    • deletePerson

      public void deletePerson(ResultSet results, Statement statement, String userInput, Person person, PersonHandler personHandler, Scanner sc, String personType, Project project, Prompt prompt) throws SQLException
      Method which deletes a person object from the database. It also check if the person is associated with any projects, and display them, if so, the person cannot be deleted unless the projects they are associated with are deleted.
      Parameters:
      results - object to store query results
      statement - object to query and update the database
      userInput - user's input
      person - person object
      personHandler - person handling object
      sc - object to get user inputs
      personType - the type of person being deleted
      project - project object
      prompt - object containing prompt methods
      Throws:
      SQLException - message for if an SQL error occurs

    • updatePersonField

      public void updatePersonField(String userInput, String personType, PersonHandler personHandler, Person person, Scanner sc, ResultSet results, Statement statement) throws SQLException
      Method to update a person's fields in the database.
      Parameters:
      userInput - user's input
      personType - the type of person being updated
      personHandler - object to handle person objects
      person - person object
      sc - object to get user inputs
      results - object to store queried information
      statement - object to query and update the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - message for if an SQL error occurs

    • assignNewPersonValuesAndEnterToDatabase

      public Person assignNewPersonValuesAndEnterToDatabase(Person person, String personType, String userInput, Scanner sc, ResultSet results, Statement statement, PersonHandler personHandler) throws SQLException
      Method which gets a person's information, adds them to the database and returns a person object with the same information.
      Parameters:
      person - person object
      personType - type of person being created
      userInput - user's input
      sc - object to get user inputs
      results - object to store queried information
      statement - object to query and update the database
      personHandler - object to handle person objects
      Returns:
      person object with the information added
      Throws:
      SQLException - message for if an SQL error occurs

      Parameters:
      statement - the object used to delete the person
      personId - the person's id
      personType - the type of person being deleted
      Throws:

    • personOnProject

      public boolean personOnProject(ResultSet results, Statement statement, String personId, String personType) throws SQLException
      Method which returns a boolean value showing whether a person is associated with a project or not. Returns true if they are and false if they are not.
      Parameters:
      results - object that stores query information from the database
      statement - object used to query the database
      personId - the id of the person
      personType - the type of the person
      Returns:
      boolean value
      Throws:
      SQLException - message for if an SQL error occurs

    • getPersonId

      public String getPersonId(Scanner scObj, ResultSet results, Statement statement, String personType, String userInput) throws SQLException
      Method which displays all the persons of a type and prompts the user to choose one by entering the id of one. If there are no IDs available, an impossible one will be returned instead.
      Parameters:
      scObj - object to get user inputs
      results - object which stores information from the database
      statement - object used to query information from the database
      personType - the type of person
      userInput - the user's input
      Returns:
      person's id
      Throws:
      SQLException - message for if an SQL error occurs

    • getPersonName

      public String getPersonName(String personType, String userInput, String nameSpecifier, Scanner scObj)
      Method which gets and returns a person's name from the user. It gets a first name or last name in this program.
      Parameters:
      personType - the type of person
      userInput - the user's input
      nameSpecifier - the kind of name of the person
      scObj - the object to get user inputs
      Returns:
      person's name

      Returns:

    • getPersonPhoneNumberMandatory

      public String getPersonPhoneNumberMandatory(String personType, String userInput, Scanner scObj)
      Method which gets and returns a phone number for a person from the user. It is a mandatory field in this method.
      Parameters:
      personType - the type of person
      userInput - the user's input
      scObj - object used to get the user's input
      Returns:
      person's phone number

    • getPersonEmailAddressMandatory

    • getPersonEmailAddress

      personType - type of person
      userInput - the user's input
      scObj - object used to get the user's input
      Returns:

    • getPersonPostalCode

      public String getPersonPostalCode(String personType, String userInput, Scanner scObj)
      Method which gets and returns the postal code of a person from the user. Very few checks on format as international postal codes vary greatly.
      Parameters:
      personType - type of person
      userInput - the user's input
      scObj - object which gets the user's input
      Returns:
      person's postal code

    • enterNewPerson

      public void enterNewPerson(Statement statement, String personType, String firstName, String lastName, String phoneNumber, String email, String streetAddress, String postalCode) throws SQLException

      Parameters:
      statement - the object which enters the person into the database
      personType - the type of person
      firstName - person's first name
      lastName - person's last name
      phoneNumber - person's phone number
      email - person's email address
      streetAddress - person's street address

    • isPhoneOrEmailNull

      public boolean isPhoneOrEmailNull(ResultSet results, Statement statement, String fieldToCheck, String personType, String personId) throws SQLException
      Method which checks whether a person's phone number or email address are recorded as null in the database. Returns a boolean value, false if the field is full and true if the field is null.
      Parameters:
      results - object which stores queried information
      statement - object which queries the database
      fieldToCheck - the field being checked
      personType - the person's type
      personId - the person's id
      Returns:
      boolean value
      Throws:
      SQLException - message for if an SQL error occurs

    • updatePersonFieldInfo

      public void updatePersonFieldInfo(Statement statement, boolean needsParenthesis, String personType, String dataToInsert, String fieldToUpdate, String personId) throws SQLException
      Method which updates a person's information on a particular field in the database.
      Parameters:
      statement - object used to update the database
      needsParenthesis - determines whether dataToInsert needs ''
      personType - person's type
      dataToInsert - the data being inserted
      fieldToUpdate - the field being updated
      personId - the person's id
      Throws:
      SQLException - message for if an SQL error occurs
